title: How good is iFlytek's voice recognition technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: If iFlytek uses the term voice recogniton when it means speech recognition, then I would suggest not very good. Speech recognition is about what is said, voice recognition is about who said it. If they can tell who said the command but not what the command was, this is not very helpful.

I try to answer this question, I have been working here for ten years, Iflytek is really foucus on tts and asr technology, China have lots of dialects, so we build a cloud based plateform in 2008, we call it “Voice Cloud”, whitch support tts and asr engine for free, there are 30 billion invoke requests per day, with huge data, we can traning a complex model to increase speech recogniton accuracy, please visit http://m.xunfei.cn get more information, hope it can help you.
